title: 12 Skims Bestsellers With Major Cyber Monday Markdowns
description: Skims went from an idea to an award-winning intimates and loungewear brand. Founded by Kim Kardashian as well as Emma and Jens Grede in 2019, the company was valued at $4 billion in July 2023, according to Forbes. Whether or not shoppers are Kardashian fans, the brand still seems to have go-to collections that continuously sell out. And many of those items are on sale for Cyber Monday. The Fits Everybody line is made with a signature stretch fabric that truly is butter-soft (in fact, I'm wearing the classic thong right now and I describe it as feeling like "nothing." In other words, it's a second skin). The Soft Lounge launch gave way to everyone's favorite long slip dress, which most people attest to be the most flattering body-conscious piece they own. And the Seamless Sculpt range provides every piece of shapewear you could possibly imagine layering underneath that slightly skin-revealing look you've been trying to figure out how to style. And then there's the nipple push-up bra that turns heads whenever I wear it and is a major bestseller. Of course, Skims has been most notably praised for its sizing (XXS-4X) and incredible assortment of nude shades to complement skin tones. Its adaptive products feature added hook and eye closures and front clasps for accessibility, though the brand is overdue for introducing more styles. Nevertheless, if you're new to shopping Skims, we highly recommend you start with the top-rated picks that most folks rave about on social - and these 12 are it. Ahead, read up on the Skims bestsellers, many of which are on sale for Cyber Monday, and decide where to shop based on your color and size preferences. Skims is available at skims.com, Nordstrom, Saks Fifth Avenue, Net-a-Porter, Ssense, and more.
author: Sarah Wasilak
excerpt: Discover the bestselling Skims products from Kim Kardashian's shapewear brand that you need to try in 2024 — including Cyber Monday sales.
text: SkimsSkimsWhile each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.Skims went from an idea to an award-winning intimates and loungewear brand. Founded by Kim Kardashian as well as Emma and Jens Grede in 2019, the company was valued at $4 billion in July 2023, according to Forbes. Whether or not shoppers are Kardashian fans, the brand still seems to have go-to collections that continuously sell out. And many of those items are on sale for Cyber Monday. The Fits Everybody line is made with a signature stretch fabric that truly is butter-soft (in fact, I'm wearing the classic thong right now and I describe it as feeling like "nothing." In other words, it's a second skin). The Soft Lounge launch gave way to everyone's favorite long slip dress, which most people attest to be the most flattering body-conscious piece they own. And the Seamless Sculpt range provides every piece of shapewear you could possibly imagine layering underneath that slightly skin-revealing look you've been trying to figure out how to style. And then there's the nipple push-up bra that turns heads whenever I wear it and is a major bestseller. Of course, Skims has been most notably praised for its sizing (XXS-4X) and incredible assortment of nude shades to complement skin tones. Its adaptive products feature added hook and eye closures and front clasps for accessibility, though the brand is overdue for introducing more styles. Nevertheless, if you're new to shopping Skims, we highly recommend you start with the top-rated picks that most folks rave about on social — and these 12 are it. Ahead, read up on the Skims bestsellers, many of which are on sale for Cyber Monday, and decide where to shop based on your color and size preferences. Skims is available at skims.com, Nordstrom, Saks Fifth Avenue, Net-a-Porter, Ssense, and more.Skims | Petra CollinsCharli XCX's Skims LookSkims Cotton Rib Split Neck Bralette ($27, originally $38) and Skims Cotton Rib Boxer ($25, originally $36) Charli XCX stars in the Skims Cotton Campaign, flaunting the split-neck bralette and matching boxers. The pieces are meant to embrace the elevated sporty look while prioritizing comfort. "Skims empowers people to feel confident in their own skin, which is the essence of Brat," Charli XCX stated in a press release. "I am excited to be working with a brand that understands that comfort and style don't need to be compromised. Shooting with Petra [Collins] for this campaign was a dream and I was so excited to get on set and wear these timeless, sexy pieces."nordstrom.comSkims Bestselling ThongSkims Fits Everybody Thong ($6-$13, originally $18) This Fits Everybody silhouette comes in a handful of different shades and is made from the stretch fabric that everyone loves. For comfort purposes, there's a cotton gusset built in, and the low-rise means you can adjust it to wear with a bottom that hangs from your hips.skims.comSkims Bestselling BraletteSkims Fits Everybody Scoop Bralette ($17, originally $34) If you're not much of a lined bra person, this scoop bralette will be right up your alley. This bronze shade is currently marked down, but there are plenty more colors to choose from. It boasts the same buttery-soft fabric as the rest of the Fits Everybody collection, and there are adjustable straps if you want to customize the height and fit of the design.skims.comSkims Bestselling SwimsuitSkims Signature Swim Plunge Bikini Top ($17, originally $42) and Skims Signature Swim Mid Waist Bottom ($15, originally $38) There's never a time when this two-piece won't feel perfectly flirty and sporty at the same time. The deep plunge top features the Skims logo on the underband (which gives it its flair and underwear-like appeal), and the matching bottom is high-cut to elongate your legs. The medium coverage makes it a perfect suit for many different people — especially those that don't feel entirely comfortable in something cheeky.nordstrom.comSkims Bestselling BoxersSkims Stretch Cotton Rib Boxer ($22-$36, originally $36) These bestselling boxer shorts were recently released in new, limited edition colors that are worth checking out, but we think they're so popular mostly for their sporty silhouette, boyfriend-inspired topstitching, and soft waistband that doesn't dig in. The coolest move is to wear them to bed with the matching bralette ($18-$36, originally $36).skims.comSkims Bestselling TankSkims Cotton Rib Tank ($30, originally $38) Just like a tee, it's hard to find the right tank top that fits your shape to your personal preference — there are a lot of different options out there. This top-seller has earned 4.5 stars with its 3,600+ reviews, and there are new limited edition colors to shop, including this flashy sugar pink. The breathable ribbed cotton material is stretchy enough to be comfortable and flattering, but not restricting. If you're not much for the crop, there's a longer length ($26, originally $38), but the shorter iteration is most popular.skims.comSkims Bestselling ShortsSkims Seamless Sculpt Mid Thigh Short ($26, originally $38) These mid-thigh bike shorts come with compression for sculpting purposes from top to bottom — including the tummy area. There's added compression along the back thighs for a "lift" with round butt pockets for definition. You've probably seen folks on TikTok marveling over the look of their butts once they slip these on. The most trustworthy detail is lesser-known, but essential for comfort: there's built-in silicone in the waistband to prevent rolling.skims.comSkims Bestselling LoungewearSkims Cotton Fleece Classic Hoodie ($38, originally $80) and Skims Cotton Fleece Jogger ($34, originally $68) Skims has launched plenty of loungewear through the years, but the bestsellers are the most classic silhouettes. The brand's signature super-soft fleece comprises this set, which would team well with your favorite pair of sneakers, a shoulder bag, and sunglasses for a day of running errands. The ribbed waistband and cuffs are a subtle detail that provide just a touch more polish.nordstrom.comSkims Bestselling DressSkims Fits Everybody Long Slipdress ($40, originally $80) I personally have heard many friends attest to how flattering this slip dress is, and it's double-lined, which helps with that secure, snatched feel. With a scoop neckline and adjustable straps, you should have no problem adjusting the look to your liking or layering with it if that's more your vibe.skims.comSkims Bestselling T-ShirtSkims Fits Everybody T-Shirt ($33, originally $48) In theory, the idea of a T-shirt is simple, but for many of us, it's a topic to be explored and widely discussed. The perfect fit is hard to come by, but this one has a second skin feel that's meant to mold to your body. The neckline is a classic crew cut, and, like most Skims products, the color range is extensive, with eight different options on the site. The innovative fabric makes this tee super-stretchy, too. "First time I've ever worn a t shirt with these kind of sleeves and not once had any sort of sweat stain! Color me impressed," one reviewer wrote.nordstrom.comSkims Bestselling BodysuitSkims Seamless Sculpt Thong Bodysuit ($49, originally $$70) Skims refers to this product as "the internet's favorite sculpting bodysuit" because it's packed with compression at the core and waist, as well as ruching at the bust that makes for a naturally lifted fit. As you probably prefer (I know I do), there's a snap closure at the gusset and the crotch area is described as wide, for anyone nervous about flimsy coverage. You can shop it in five shades at Nordstrom, and 12 tones that veer on the neutral side at skims.com.nordstrom.comSkims Bestselling BraSkims Fits Everybody T-Shirt Bra ($27-$54, originally $54) The Skims Fits Everybody Bra comes in seven different neutral shades on Nordstrom's site, but a total of 11 on skims.com, including two limited edition colors. The silhouette is so popular because it's "buttery-soft," as it's described and is built with a stretchy polyamide and elastane blend that expands 360 degrees. Another big perk? The underwire doesn't dig, so you can expect all-day comfort. Reviews mostly highlight the range of neutral shades to match many different skin tones, as well as the bra's overall durability.Sarah Wasilak (she/her) is the associate director of Shopping at PS. With plenty of experience in the commerce market, a keen interest in SEO, and 10 years as an editor at the brand, she enjoys writing across the lifestyle and health-and-fitness categories. She has bylines at PS, InStyle, Elle, Refinery29, Who What Wear, Elite Daily, Byrdie, and The Quality Edit and aims to amplify minority voices in all her work.
html:
While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

Skims went from an idea to an award-winning intimates and loungewear brand. Founded by Kim Kardashian as well as Emma and Jens Grede in 2019, the company was valued at $4 billion in July 2023, according to Forbes. Whether or not shoppers are Kardashian fans, the brand still seems to have go-to collections that continuously sell out. And many of those items are on sale for Cyber Monday.

The Fits Everybody line is made with a signature stretch fabric that truly is butter-soft (in fact, I'm wearing the classic thong right now and I describe it as feeling like "nothing." In other words, it's a second skin). The Soft Lounge launch gave way to everyone's favorite long slip dress, which most people attest to be the most flattering body-conscious piece they own. And the Seamless Sculpt range provides every piece of shapewear you could possibly imagine layering underneath that slightly skin-revealing look you've been trying to figure out how to style. And then there's the nipple push-up bra that turns heads whenever I wear it and is a major bestseller.

Of course, Skims has been most notably praised for its sizing (XXS-4X) and incredible assortment of nude shades to complement skin tones. Its adaptive products feature added hook and eye closures and front clasps for accessibility, though the brand is overdue for introducing more styles. Nevertheless, if you're new to shopping Skims, we highly recommend you start with the top-rated picks that most folks rave about on social — and these 12 are it.

Ahead, read up on the Skims bestsellers, many of which are on sale for Cyber Monday, and decide where to shop based on your color and size preferences. Skims is available at skims.com, Nordstrom, Saks Fifth Avenue, Net-a-Porter, Ssense, and more.

Charli XCX's Skims Look

Skims Cotton Rib Split Neck Bralette ($27, originally $38) and Skims Cotton Rib Boxer ($25, originally $36)

Charli XCX stars in the Skims Cotton Campaign, flaunting the split-neck bralette and matching boxers. The pieces are meant to embrace the elevated sporty look while prioritizing comfort. "Skims empowers people to feel confident in their own skin, which is the essence of Brat," Charli XCX stated in a press release. "I am excited to be working with a brand that understands that comfort and style don't need to be compromised. Shooting with Petra [Collins] for this campaign was a dream and I was so excited to get on set and wear these timeless, sexy pieces."

Skims Bestselling Thong

Skims Fits Everybody Thong ($6-$13, originally $18)

This Fits Everybody silhouette comes in a handful of different shades and is made from the stretch fabric that everyone loves. For comfort purposes, there's a cotton gusset built in, and the low-rise means you can adjust it to wear with a bottom that hangs from your hips.

Skims Bestselling Bralette

Skims Fits Everybody Scoop Bralette ($17, originally $34)

If you're not much of a lined bra person, this scoop bralette will be right up your alley. This bronze shade is currently marked down, but there are plenty more colors to choose from. It boasts the same buttery-soft fabric as the rest of the Fits Everybody collection, and there are adjustable straps if you want to customize the height and fit of the design.

Skims Bestselling Swimsuit

Skims Signature Swim Plunge Bikini Top ($17, originally $42) and Skims Signature Swim Mid Waist Bottom ($15, originally $38)

There's never a time when this two-piece won't feel perfectly flirty and sporty at the same time. The deep plunge top features the Skims logo on the underband (which gives it its flair and underwear-like appeal), and the matching bottom is high-cut to elongate your legs. The medium coverage makes it a perfect suit for many different people — especially those that don't feel entirely comfortable in something cheeky.

Skims Bestselling Boxers

Skims Stretch Cotton Rib Boxer ($22-$36, originally $36)

These bestselling boxer shorts were recently released in new, limited edition colors that are worth checking out, but we think they're so popular mostly for their sporty silhouette, boyfriend-inspired topstitching, and soft waistband that doesn't dig in. The coolest move is to wear them to bed with the matching bralette ($18-$36, originally $36).

Skims Bestselling Tank

Skims Cotton Rib Tank ($30, originally $38)

Just like a tee, it's hard to find the right tank top that fits your shape to your personal preference — there are a lot of different options out there. This top-seller has earned 4.5 stars with its 3,600+ reviews, and there are new limited edition colors to shop, including this flashy sugar pink. The breathable ribbed cotton material is stretchy enough to be comfortable and flattering, but not restricting. If you're not much for the crop, there's a longer length ($26, originally $38), but the shorter iteration is most popular.

Skims Bestselling Shorts

Skims Seamless Sculpt Mid Thigh Short ($26, originally $38)

These mid-thigh bike shorts come with compression for sculpting purposes from top to bottom — including the tummy area. There's added compression along the back thighs for a "lift" with round butt pockets for definition. You've probably seen folks on TikTok marveling over the look of their butts once they slip these on. The most trustworthy detail is lesser-known, but essential for comfort: there's built-in silicone in the waistband to prevent rolling.

Skims Bestselling Loungewear

Skims Cotton Fleece Classic Hoodie ($38, originally $80) and Skims Cotton Fleece Jogger ($34, originally $68)

Skims has launched plenty of loungewear through the years, but the bestsellers are the most classic silhouettes. The brand's signature super-soft fleece comprises this set, which would team well with your favorite pair of sneakers, a shoulder bag, and sunglasses for a day of running errands. The ribbed waistband and cuffs are a subtle detail that provide just a touch more polish.

Skims Bestselling Dress

Skims Fits Everybody Long Slipdress ($40, originally $80)

I personally have heard many friends attest to how flattering this slip dress is, and it's double-lined, which helps with that secure, snatched feel. With a scoop neckline and adjustable straps, you should have no problem adjusting the look to your liking or layering with it if that's more your vibe.

Skims Bestselling T-Shirt

Skims Fits Everybody T-Shirt ($33, originally $48)

In theory, the idea of a T-shirt is simple, but for many of us, it's a topic to be explored and widely discussed. The perfect fit is hard to come by, but this one has a second skin feel that's meant to mold to your body. The neckline is a classic crew cut, and, like most Skims products, the color range is extensive, with eight different options on the site. The innovative fabric makes this tee super-stretchy, too. "First time I've ever worn a t shirt with these kind of sleeves and not once had any sort of sweat stain! Color me impressed," one reviewer wrote.

Skims Bestselling Bodysuit

Skims Seamless Sculpt Thong Bodysuit ($49, originally $$70)

Skims refers to this product as "the internet's favorite sculpting bodysuit" because it's packed with compression at the core and waist, as well as ruching at the bust that makes for a naturally lifted fit. As you probably prefer (I know I do), there's a snap closure at the gusset and the crotch area is described as wide, for anyone nervous about flimsy coverage. You can shop it in five shades at Nordstrom, and 12 tones that veer on the neutral side at skims.com.

Skims Bestselling Bra

Skims Fits Everybody T-Shirt Bra ($27-$54, originally $54)

The Skims Fits Everybody Bra comes in seven different neutral shades on Nordstrom's site, but a total of 11 on skims.com, including two limited edition colors. The silhouette is so popular because it's "buttery-soft," as it's described and is built with a stretchy polyamide and elastane blend that expands 360 degrees. Another big perk? The underwire doesn't dig, so you can expect all-day comfort. Reviews mostly highlight the range of neutral shades to match many different skin tones, as well as the bra's overall durability.

Sarah Wasilak (she/her) is the associate director of Shopping at PS. With plenty of experience in the commerce market, a keen interest in SEO, and 10 years as an editor at the brand, she enjoys writing across the lifestyle and health-and-fitness categories. She has bylines at PS, InStyle, Elle, Refinery29, Who What Wear, Elite Daily, Byrdie, and The Quality Edit and aims to amplify minority voices in all her work.
